Title: Tired of the usual cakes? Try these delicious flavours
Summary: Tired of the usual cakes? Try these delicious flavours . Red velvet, vanilla, and chocolate are usually the first flavors that come to mind . But there’s a whole world of delicious options outside these three waiting to be explored .

Title: Alleged cybercrime: Judge’s absence stalls Natasha Akpoti-Uduaghan’s trial
Summary: Federal High Court sitting in Abuja adjourned the trial of Sen. Natasha Akpoti-Uduaghan for alleged cybercrime until February 4, 2026 . The matter, which was fixed for today by Justice Mohammed Umar, could not proceed due to the absence of the judge .

Title: UK budget tests Labour govt’s credibility
Summary: Britain’s centre-left Labour government unveils its annual budget Wednesday . Expected tax rises to curb debt and fund public services threaten to further dent its weak poll ratings . Prime Minister Keir Starmer has promised a “Labour budget with Labour values”

Title: Giroud brace earns Lille win over Paris FC in Ligue 1
Summary: Olivier Giroud netted twice as Lille won 4-2 at home to Paris FC in Ligue 1 on Sunday . Veteran forward Giroud scored twice in Lille's win over Paris FC .

Title: Olamide sells out OVO Arena in his first solo UK show in almost a decade
Summary: Olamide Adedeji returned to London for his first solo UK show in almost ten years . Fans filled the 12,500-capacity OVO Arena Wembley for a night packed with energy .

Title: No nation survives on excuses or absentee leadership – Peter Obi
Summary: Leaders must remember that governance is not a title; it is a duty to protect all citizens with competence and compassion . No nation survives on excuses or absentee leadership – Peter Obi .

Title: GENCOs reject FG’s offer to forfeit 50% of N5trn debt
Summary: GenCos have again rejected FG’s offer to forfeit 50% of N5trn debt . “For them now to draw up individual contracts for the companies and force it down on them is quite unfortunate," he said .

Title: Zelensky hails ‘important steps’ in peace talks but says more work needed
Summary: Zelensky hails ‘important steps’ in peace talks but says more work needed . "In the steps we have coordinated with the side of the US, we've managed to keep extremely sensitive points," he says .

Title: ‘They boasted they were bandits; no one slips away’ – Kwara church kidnap survivor narrates ordeal
Summary: He was one of the 38 victims rescued by security operatives . President Bola Tinubu confirmed the development on Sunday . The president also confirmed the rescue as a result .

Title: Alleged cybercrime: Court adjourns Senator Natasha’s trial to Feb 2026
Summary: Court adjourns Senator Natasha’s trial to Feb 2026 . The development was after a television screen had been mounted in the courtroom .
